programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Humorous adaptation of the classic Dr Seuss childrens book, in which two housebound children are visited by a cat who saves them from their rainy-day boredom by bringing mayhem to their house.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college leavers Fred and Barney decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends, Wilma and Betty. Fred, however, has a rival for the affections of his classy girlfriend Wilma - the wealthy playboy Chip Rockefeller.

programme.title: The Portable Door
programme.desc: A man lands an internship at a mysterious London firm with unconventional employees, including the charismatic CEO who is incorporating modern corporate strategy into ancient magical practices.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Victoria and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: A New York couple go to an orphanage to adopt a brother for their only son, but instead come away with a little mouse. On arrival at his new home, the diminutive rodent receives a lukewarm welcome by the boy - and an even frostier reception from the pet cat. Featuring a mixture of live action and animation.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the childrens story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Humorous adaptation of the classic Dr Seuss childrens book, in which two housebound children are visited by a cat who saves them from their rainy-day boredom by bringing mayhem to their house.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college leavers Fred and Barney decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends, Wilma and Betty. Fred, however, has a rival for the affections of his classy girlfriend Wilma - the wealthy playboy Chip Rockefeller.

programme.title: The Portable Door
programme.desc: A man lands an internship at a mysterious London firm with unconventional employees, including the charismatic CEO who is incorporating modern corporate strategy into ancient magical practices.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Victoria and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: A New York couple go to an orphanage to adopt a brother for their only son, but instead come away with a little mouse. On arrival at his new home, the diminutive rodent receives a lukewarm welcome by the boy - and an even frostier reception from the pet cat. Featuring a mixture of live action and animation.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the childrens story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Lighthearted adventures of a pair of news vendors in New York - one deaf, one blind - who go on the run when they are blamed for the murder of a customer. Each has seen - or heard - just a whiff of a clue, and a frantic chase ensues as the duo struggle to clear their names.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Shirley is a Liverpudlian housewife stuck in a loveless marriage. One day she finds herself talking to the wall, and decides to make some changes in her life. Flying off to the Greek island of Mykonos on her own, she is gently romanced by middle-aged waiter Costas.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friends killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop from the original film returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Axel Foley and his Beverly Hills buddies investigate criminal activities at a Southern California amusement park.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Favourites
programme.desc: Discover some of the very best Sky Originals to watch with the whole family, from Monster Family to The Amazing Maurice.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Favourites
programme.desc: Discover some of the very best Sky Originals to watch with the whole family, from Monster Family to The Amazing Maurice.

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Sing is a street hustler who makes the mistake of pretending to be a member of the notorious Axe gang. He becomes caught up in a war between the gang and the residents of Pig Sty Alley, which the gang want to take over. Little do they know that two of the Alleys residents are retired martial arts experts and soon the fists and feet are flying in knockabout fights.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually cant afford. Things change when Willy Wonka, head of the very popular Wonka Chocolate empire, announces a contest in which five gold tickets have been hidden in chocolate bars. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonkas chocolate factory.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Docs violent, bank-robbing cronies - including Buddy, Bats and Darling - get in and out of Dodge before its too late. Hes not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the houses secrets and end the bloodshed.

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: When a perfect night with a perfect stranger ends suddenly the next morning, Charlotte searches for answers and meaning in her life. However, she soon uncovers a shocking secret that changes everything she knows about the man who captured her heart.

programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final 24-hour shift, a burned-out paramedic is tasked with training his eager but inexperienced replacement. What starts as a routine night quickly spirals into a chaotic odyssey that tests their endurance, instincts and sense of humour.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her sons science teacher.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Marvin is a Milwaukee realtor who receives a crimson envelope from a former partner-in-crime whom he left for dead. He now finds himself thrust back into a world of ruthless hit men and double-crosses that turn his open houses into deadly war zones.

programme.title: Wish You Were Here

programme.title: Novocaine

programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.desc: An exuberant tale full of giant pumpkins, madcap characters and a little girl who just might be a pumpkin-growing savant. (2025, 107 mins)

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Marvin is a Milwaukee realtor who receives a crimson envelope from a former partner-in-crime whom he left for dead. He now finds himself thrust back into a world of ruthless hit men and double-crosses that turn his open houses into deadly war zones.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her sons science teacher.

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final 24-hour shift, a burned-out paramedic is tasked with training his eager but inexperienced replacement. What starts as a routine night quickly spirals into a chaotic odyssey that tests their endurance, instincts and sense of humour.

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: Attacked by an unseen animal, Blake and his family barricade themselves inside a farmhouse as the creature prowls the perimeter. As the night stretches on, however, he begins to behave strangely, transforming into something unrecognizable.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the houses secrets and end the bloodshed.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: A tech blogger unleashes the power of a time-altering device to rewrite the past and seek revenge against the ruthless corporate empire that destroyed his family.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, wanted criminal Riddick must confront two teams of mercenaries, one of whom is led by a man from his past.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The world is struck by inexplicable phenomena - Romes Colosseum explodes, Londons pigeons go berserk - until it becomes apparent that the planets core has stopped moving, causing electro-magnetic mayhem. The only hope lies in a crack team of scientists burrowing to the core and re-starting earths engine, but is the disaster natural or is there a more sinister explanation?

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Monolith
programme.desc: While trying to salvage her career, a disgraced journalist begins investigating a strange conspiracy theory. However, as the trail leads uncomfortably close to home, shes left to grapple with the lies at the heart of her own story.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Live Die Repeat: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A soldier who was killed in action gets caught up in a time loop, in which he repeatedly relives his last battle. However, the more times he fights, the closer he gets to discovering how to defeat the alien enemy.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: Following the death of a local diver, a New York palaeontologist is sent out to help the local fisheries warden investigate the case.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: Bank clerk Freddie graduates from collecting butterflies to collecting girls. Only one girl can match wits with him. This quietly chilling film is based on the novel by John Fowles.

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.title: Wolf Man

programme.title: Little Bone Lodge
programme.desc: Set during a vicious storm, two criminal brothers on the run seek refuge in a desolate farmhouse. Taking the resident family captive, they find the house holds dark secrets of its own.

programme.title: The Collector

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. Together, they uncover the orders unholy secret. Risking not only their lives but their faith and their very souls, they confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

programme.title: The Damned
programme.desc: Fighting for survival at an isolated fishing outpost, Eva and her crew are cursed after making the choice to not help a sinking ship off the coast. Facing the consequences, a darkness consumes them all, creating chaos and death at every turn.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: A famous actress calls upon medical science for help when her daughter begins behaving strangely, but without any success. Then, as bizarre and horrific incidents involving the daughter increase, her mother turns in desperation to the Church, and to a priest who doubts his own faith.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A seance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widows youngest daughter in 1967 Los Angeles.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Head Count
programme.desc: After escaping prison, Kats own revolver is pointed to his head by an unknown assailant. As the empty rounds click away, he tries to remember what happened to each bullet.

programme.title: Mob Cops
programme.desc: When a retired NYPD detective writes a book about his familys ties to the mob, it ignites a firestorm between dirty cops working for a brutal crime boss and the officers trying to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Barber
programme.desc: A wealthy widow hires private investigator Val Barber to find her missing granddaughter. As dark secrets start to surface, Barber finds himself entangled with shady and powerful men who are determind to thwart his investigation.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sants remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcocks day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of U.S. soldiers.

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: Based on the true story of policeman Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD. Going beyond the call of duty, he is rewarded for his commitment.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The murder of Austrias crown prince leads Holmes, Watson and a Gypsy to a showdown with an evil genius named Moriarty.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances, then funnel the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his familys killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sants remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcocks day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: Ruthless
programme.desc: A high school coach hunts down the men responsible for an underground human trafficking operation.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: The curator of the Louvre museum is murdered, leaving behind a chain of obscure clues to a world-changing secret. Cryptologist Sophie Neveu and Harvard professor Robert Langdon embark on a race against time to uncover the precious truth before it falls into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is surprised to be approached by the Popes emissaries for help. Following the Popes recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiffs place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the worlds population.

programme.desc: Suspected of smuggling narcotics, a jittery travelers next stop is a medical facility; a pair arrives bearing a trophy; CBP question a DJs find.

programme.title: Border Security: Americas Front Line
programme.desc: Follow US border protection agencies as they man the front lines of national security.

programme.title: Brit Cops: Law and Disorder
programme.desc: The City of London police safeguard the square mile at the heart of a crime-ridden capital.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: Witness one of the most exciting UK pursuits ever as police chase a criminal at high speed through the grounds of Milton Keynes hospital ending with a smash into a group of parked cars. Also, an American cop cannot believe the driver hes stopped for speeding cannot see.

programme.title: Stop Search Seize
programme.desc: Join Irelands Customs teams as they, with the help of the Irish police, try to stop organised smugglers from bringing drugs, cars and even exotic animals into the country.

programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: Police call on multiple units and a helicopter as they hunt a stolen Subaru, and a cyclist cant quite comprehend why he cant bike along the motorway.

programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: A Kiwi stag night ditches the Aussie brother-in-law to be, and a car crash leads to some unusual behaviour on the side of the motorway.

programme.title: Caught on Dashcam
programme.desc: Driving is taken to a whole new level as we look at the madness of motorways, encounters with violent storms, animals on the loose, hell-raising getaway chases, heroic acts of rescue, and some things that are just bizarre.

programme.title: The Real Manhunter
programme.desc: Sutton details the investigation into a long-running feud between neighbours that took a deadly turn.

programme.title: Forensics: Catching The Killer
programme.desc: When 3 year-old Lucy is reported missing by her mother, police and forensic investigators begin the painstaking search for the truth.

programme.title: How I Caught the Killer
programme.desc: A seemingly ordinary family man is the prime suspect when his wife, three young children and mother-in-law are brutally killed after church.

programme.title: Britains Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: A profile of the man who murdered his wife, two children and two dogs on one terrifying day.

programme.title: Killer in My Village
programme.desc: Examining the 2022 murder of doting mother, Kerry Owen, who simply wanted a loving relationship but fell into one tarnished by the abuse of a man who would leave her dead in a country lane.

programme.title: Forensics: Catching The Killer
programme.desc: Years after the crime, see how forensics helped solve the murder of Becky Godden-Edwards, finding a killer who had sadly murdered again.

programme.title: Worlds Most Evil Killers
programme.sub-title: Paul Michael Stephani: The Weepy-Voiced Killer
programme.desc: The story of a killer who was infamous for his whimpering confessions over the phone after each of his murders.

programme.title: How I Caught the Killer
programme.sub-title: Malone: The Killer With No Conscience
programme.desc: Revealing, like never before, what it is like to be a police officer working on the most incredible and inconceivable murder cases in criminal history. A look into murder cases from the first 999 call, the investigation and then the guilty verdict.

programme.title: Forensics: Catching the Killer
programme.desc: A look at how forensic science can help police solve serious crimes where the truth seems impossible to uncover. As the various twists and turns of each case unfold, the role of forensic science in providing answers is highlighted and examined.

programme.title: Britains Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: Analysis of what drove Raoul Moat to shoot his ex-girlfriend, her new lover and a policeman, leading to the largest manhunt in modern British history.

programme.title: The Murderer and Me
programme.desc: As an unknown killer dubbed The Suffolk Strangler terrorised a community with a string of murders in Ipswich, Pam had no idea she was sharing a bed with him.

programme.title: Murder Uncut
programme.desc: Nikki Sue Entzel dials 9 to report a fire at her home, but the supposed accidental house fire turns into a murder investigation.

programme.title: Catching a Serial Killer: Sam Little
programme.desc: Sam Little is a serial killer who confessed to murdering more than 90 women in 17 states.

programme.title: Britains Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: When Charlotte Murray didnt show up to spend her 34th birthday with her twin sister, their family knew something was seriously wrong.

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: In medieval England, the North was ruled from York. Dan Jones explores the history of its castle, from the Viking Jorvik and the Normans, through the dark days of the anti-Jewish pogrom and the imprisonment of the Knights Templar, to one of its most colourful inmates - the legendary highwayman Dick Turpin.

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: With the aid of dramatic reconstruction, Dan Jones explores the 900-year history of the beautiful Leeds Castle in Kent, from its origins as a royal Saxon familys manor and Norman stronghold to the private property of six medieval queens, a Tudor palace, a Jacobean country house, a Georgian mansion and an elegant 20th-century retreat for the rich and famous.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia
programme.desc: Exploring the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Facing flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish, Lizzie investigates why so many strange creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild
programme.desc: An adventure with Thiago, a brave baby coati. Explores how this raccoon-like animal sharpens his sniffing and foraging skills, crosses suburban roads near his lush Brazilian forest home, and avoids inanimate and four-legged dangers.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: A fawn survives a snare and a bobcat attack. A baby bobcat winds up on Hopes doorstep, and an old friend returns to the rehab.

programme.title: Irelands Wild Islands with Eoin Warner
programme.desc: Exploring a 1,500-year-old monastery among the crags of the world-famous Skellig Islands. A look at Manx shearwaters and humpback whales, a chase after pygmy shrews on Clare, and a peek at an autumn spectacle on the Aran Islands.

programme.title: Ocean Parks
programme.desc: These Parks are monitored by Ocean advocates dedicated to maintaining the shark feeding grounds, turtle populations, and marine spawning grounds that line this incredible reef system.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia
programme.desc: Exploring the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Facing flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish, Lizzie investigates why so many strange creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: Rooted
programme.desc: The Namaqua Rock Fig Tree stands rooted on the slope of a rocky hill in Namaqualand, South Africa. It is the ultimate survivor, able to withstand the unforgiving conditions in a landscape facing ever rising temperatures and less and less rainfall each year.

programme.title: Wild Family Ties
programme.desc: From the moment they take their precious first steps as babies, little ones face a great many difficulties and dangers across the animal kingdom as they strive to survive to adulthood.

programme.title: Ocean Parks
programme.desc: The Exuma Cays are tiny islands near the Bahamian Capital of Nassau.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Woolly monkey Piquita requires an operation, new capuchin Louis gets a lovely perch, while the chimp team find themselves trying to navigate a double blow after two sad losses.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison visits Twycross Zoo to collect an orphaned orangutan in need of a new home, plus there is some startling news about a capuchin recently rescued from a life in the pet trade.

programme.title: Rooted
programme.desc: This is the incredible story of a tree that has been around for eight hundred years - that can withstand the harshest conditions - and that is more loved by insects, birds and animals than any other - the enormous Baobab. Rooted on the savannah of Malilangwe Game Reserve in southern Zimbabwe.

programme.title: Wild Family Ties
programme.desc: Making our first friends is something we cant forget and its the same in the wild. Here, discover the importance of having allies and gaining trust in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: The Living Beach
programme.desc: he mythology of Mexicos Yucatan Peninsula includes a protective Earth Mother figure, Ixchel, who brings fertility and healing to the region. In the shadow of Ixchel, we witness an ancient birthing ritual.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America
programme.desc: Embark on an exhilarating journey as Lizzie traverses air, land and sea to encounter Alaskan wildlife and explore the worlds most remote corners. Join scientists eavesdropping on underwater Arctic residents.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Gorgeous Engagement Ring Setback!; Conspiracy Theory Flight Plan?!

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: The disappearance of a young woman leads police to a man with a criminal history, but with no body, there can be no arrest until they discover a charred tooth.

programme.desc: A wealthy woman died suddenly, but investigators were stumped, with evidence of foul play. Until the ex-wife of the bereaved husband called to make suspicious claims.

programme.title: Storm of Suspicion
programme.desc: In a frigid New York winter, police investigate Joan Bents disappearance, questioning her husband, concerned boyfriend and a sacked employee. After Joans body is discovered, detectives find their answers have been preserved in the icy conditions.

programme.title: Storm of Suspicion
programme.desc: During a bitter, lengthy Michigan winter, a young father vanishes. As spring arrives, a gruesome discovery is made. The harsh winter conditions may aid investigators in their quest for the truth.

programme.title: 48 Hours

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Storm of Suspicion
programme.desc: In California, an innocent couple were found shot dead in a car park. As detectives investigated, they discovered their deaths were part of a murderous plot targeting law enforcement.

programme.title: Storm of Suspicion
programme.desc: With no evidence, detectives were stuck investigating the missing expectant mother, but the spring thaw exposed a flaw in a sinister scheme.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Investigating the brutal murder of beloved Los Angeles hairstylist and beauty company executive Fabio Sementilli.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: In Miami, a sniper opened fire from the roof of a factory. When police found the gun, the serial number had been scratched off. How did they trace the killer?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a serial killer was terrorising the city of St Louis, the FBI didnt need lab tests, fingerprints of any of the usual methods. All they needed was a computer.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Using geographical profiling, investigators close in on a serial rapist, and a cleverly obtained DNA sample confirms their suspicions.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a mother becomes ill while travelling in an airplane, the toxic substance specialist seated next to her suspects her home might be making her and her family sick.

programme.sub-title: Bloody Assault at the Comedy Show!; Wedding Chapel Catastrophe!
programme.desc: Evidence includes an assault caught on video and a vulgar voicemail; a woman says the site of her wedding was misrepresented.

programme.sub-title: Ex-Girlfriend Escape Caught on Tape!; Show Me the Money Trail!
programme.desc: A man says his ex broke in, she says she was invited; a woman is accused of firing her contractor after he made a deal with her insurance company.

programme.sub-title: Unbelievable Lawsuit!; Cheating, Guns and a Stolen Laptop?!
programme.desc: An uninsured driver sues the driver she crashed into; a man sues his ex for a laptop, she claims he was cheating.

programme.sub-title: Shhh ... Dont Tell My Husband!; Cash up Front, Friend!
programme.desc: A man loans a co-worker money but asks that it be kept a secret; a woman gives a friend a car title without full payment.

programme.sub-title: Boiling Water Poured on High Roommate?!; Tell the Truth!

programme.sub-title: Pregnancy False Alarm Vandal?!; Mustang Mishap
programme.desc: An online hookup ends badly when a mans car gets vandalized after he allegedly gets a woman pregnant only weeks after they met; a year after a woman sells her car, she gets hit by impound fees because the buyer never registered the vehicle.

programme.sub-title: Repo Man Chased Down!; Whats a Pyredoodle Puppy?!

programme.desc: A woman claims she was frightened for her life and her childrens lives by an ex-boyfriend. He presents texts that tell a different story.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: Wine stains cover a wall after a fight gets physical between lovers, leading to a roommate suing for damages.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his Appletons Guide, Michael Portillo reaches a milestone on his American journey: the boundary between the northern and southern states, known as the Mason-Dixon line. He discovers the origins of what became for black Americans the border between slavery and freedom, in an 18th century English dispute over land. On the heritage Wilmington and Western Railroad, Michael meets Phoebe Snow, created to reassure passengers that clean burning coal wouldnt make their clothes dirty.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo arrives in the nations capital, Washington DC, centre of political power in the worlds most powerful country. He discovers how it was built from scratch after a political compromise between north and south. At the Bureau of Engraving and Printing, Michael meets the man responsible for engraving the portrait of President Abraham Lincoln on the current five-dollar bill and gets his hands on more money than he has ever held in his life.

programme.desc: Derek waxes lyrical about a pristine Jaguar XJ8 and a Ford Model T van tests his driving skills.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.desc: Uncovering hidden structures built by the Nazis. Focusing on Guernsey, which Hitler occupied and fortified over the course of five years.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team are at Tewkesbury Abbey in Gloucestershire for the first episode of a brand new series, and over 2,000 visitors dig out their treasures in anticipation.Two sisters gifted with their great-great-grandmothers jewellery are drawn into the `battle of the bangles to find out who has the finest inheritance.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team visit Audley End near Saffron Walden in Essex. Scouring through the family treasures brought in by visitors, the experts discover a varied set of items. These include the sword that ended the War of Independence in America, a large collection of toilet chains, a beautiful silver container that once contained the gall stone of a goat and three vases decorated with fairies.
